description:
There is 4 color code you have to crack. The black and white symbols give you hints (black: correct color on the correct place, white: correct color but wrong place)

You can configure how many different colors you can choose from, whether you want duplicates or not and how many guesses you may have.

Don't install it if you don't like logic games. The App on purpose doesn't give you many hints.

This is a free app without advertisement - if you like the game, give me a nice review so I'm motivated to enhance it and to add more Apps to the App Catalog.

Enjoy the game!
versionNote: Tap on a previous color fills it in the current row of the same color
